T05nagsaliu:3: bhoṭabhāṣāyām - hphagaspā - salu - jaṅapā - śesvyavā - thegpā - chenapoī - doī - gyācher bśadpā
T05nagsaliu:6: tatra 'anantācintyaguṇyaṃ hi' ityādiṣu anantaguṇyamiti guṇaṃ hi balābhayāsaṃsṛṣṭādiguṇārthe devamanuṣyaiḥ pariceyatvāt,
T05nagsaliu:27: kleśāśīviṣabhayāplutāna itastataḥ paribhramato 'nyāṃścāpi sanmārge sanniveśya mokṣānuttaramahānagare
T05nagsaliu:34: tasmāt taṃ buddhaṃ karuṇātmakaṃ praṇipatya śālistambamiti ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:36: praṇipatya kiṃ karomīti cet- śālistambamiti sūtrasya upanibaddhaśāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmi /
T05nagsaliu:44: tasmāt tādṛśaṃ sarvajñaṃ viraktaṃ sambuddhaṃ karuṇātmaka iti yaḥ sarvaṃjānan vītarāgaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:45: sa ācāryamuṣṭerabhāvād aparān yathāvagataṃ dharmaṃ diśati /
T05nagsaliu:53: śāstraṃ racayitum ādau sambandha-prayojana-abhidhānābhidheyacatuṣṭayaṃ kiṃ na nirvacanīyam?
T05nagsaliu:63: evaṃ vādine ucyate - asambandhāditvāditi yaduktaṃ ityuktahetorasiddham uktāyām atroktau sambandhādayaścatvāraḥ santyeva /
T05nagsaliu:65: ucyate - śālistambasūtropanibaddha-śāstrakārikāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇatvād atra sambandhaḥ syād eva /
T05nagsaliu:66: śālistambasūtramiti tīrthikādyanyeṣu granthaviśeṣaṇatayā anupalabdhatvāt śāstramidaṃ buddhasambaddham /
T05nagsaliu:70: gamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ vibhajya anuttara-samyaksaṃbuddhopalabdhiḥ atra prayojanamastyeva /
T05nagsaliu:72: yadyad sārthakaṃ tat tat tu viracanīyam /
T05nagsaliu:74: asyābhidhānena śālistambopamayā ādhyātmika-bāhya-pratītyasamutpāda-samupayogād anenābhidhānena śālistambamiti cāpi bhavati /
T05nagsaliu:76: abhidheyamiti pratītyasamutpādasya dvādaśāṅgasya sapratyayasya pṛthaktaḥ yathākramaṃ
T05nagsaliu:77: lakṣaṇavyavasthāpanāt kartrādīn ahetūn pratikūlahetūn ca vihāya kleśopakleśa prahāṇāt
T05nagsaliu:93: ajātagauravāṇāṃ tu abhūtatvād hetvarthe ca siddha eva /
T05nagsaliu:94: api śiṣṭācāra-nayapradarśanārthaṃ śāstrārambhe śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā /
T05nagsaliu:96: yadā kaścit prayojanārambhaṇamavatarati prathamam iṣṭadevaṃ praṇamya viśiṣṭaprayojanaṃ praviśati,
T05nagsaliu:98: tasmād anenāpi śāstrakāreṇa tāmeva sadācāranītim anusaratā śāstrārambhaṇe svaśāsturguṇābhidhānapūrvakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā śāstravyākhyānāvatārād atra prayojanamastyeva /
T05nagsaliu:99: ucyate - śāstrārambhe śāstre praṇāmakaraṇam na niṣphalam śāstari śāstreṣu ca gauravotpādahetvartham, nānyathā /
T05nagsaliu:101: tasmācca paraiḥ śāstrādau praṇāmakaraṇaṃ niṣprayojanam iti kimucyate?
T05nagsaliu:103: śāstram ārabdhuṃ praṇāmakaraṇaṃ tu cikitsādiśāstravat saprayojanam eva,
T05nagsaliu:105: svaśāstāraṃ praṇamya śālistambasūtropanibaddhāṃ śāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmīti ukte /
T05nagsaliu:106: katamā ca sā iti cet - munī rājagṛhasyaiva ityādi kathitam rājagṛhaṃ tu rājño gṛham rājaprasāda ityarthaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:111: bhagavataḥ ekasmin samaye iti ekasmin samaye /
T05nagsaliu:121: dhātutrayamapi cittamātram' iti avagamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇa-rahitadvāreṇa kleśā bhagnāḥ /
T05nagsaliu:122: nitya-sukha-śuci-sātmyāviparyāsacatuṣṭayādirahitaḥ anuttaradharmakāya saṃyukto 'pratiṣṭhita nirvāṇopalabdheḥ skandhaṃ mṛtyumārañca jayati /
T05nagsaliu:125: mahāmaitryādi-bāṇākṣepeṇa sasainyaṃ makaradhvajaṃ prahṛtya devaputramāraṃ parājayata /
T05nagsaliu:133: yadā tannagare kupitairamānuṣaiḥ punaḥ punaragniḥ kṣiptastadā rājāvagatya ādiśat,
T05nagsaliu:135: adya prabhṛti yasya gṛhaṃ prathamaṃ agninā dahyate,
T05nagsaliu:136: sa śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ gatvā gṛhaṃ nirmāya vased ityājñātavān /
T05nagsaliu:138: tato rājā amātyānāhūyādiśat - jñānina amātyāḥ jānantu evaṃ,
T05nagsaliu:139: mayaiva tannayaprajñāpāt mayaiva tadatikramo mayi na śobhate, anayatvāt /
T05nagsaliu:144: tadā prathamaṃ rājā tatra gatvā uvāsa /
T05nagsaliu:147: yasya parvatasya śikharo gṛdhraśirovat sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvata ityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:148: athavā pāpena māreṇa gṛdhrākāramabhinirmāya bhagavaccīvaraharaṇārambhe bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenā - sāmarthyāt tatraiva nikṣiptaṃ,
T05nagsaliu:153: na, bhikṣūṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaiḥ sārdhaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:154: bhikṣūṇāṃ arthāt bhikṣusārdhamardhatrayodaśabhiḥ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena bodhisattvānāṃ ca iti tu saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattva-mahāsattvaiḥ sārdham
T05nagsaliu:167: yadā brāhmaṇeṣu gṛhastheṣu ca anugrahādi kṛtaṃ tadā nivāsa-sthānaṃ grāma-nagarādi,
T05nagsaliu:183: kutra kaiścit samaṃ kvāpi kasmāt kasmai ca deśitam /
T05nagsaliu:188: tadutpādaka īśvarādiḥ ko 'pi anyo nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ / api coktam -
T05nagsaliu:197: dvādaśāṅgaḥ bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī anyo vā yaḥ kaścit kṛtādikaṃ ahetu-pratikūlahetu-virahitaṃ paśyati, sa
T05nagsaliu:200: aṣṭāṅgamāryadharmaṃ phaladharmādhigamasvabhāvatāṃ saskandhanirvāṇaṃ aśeṣa skandhābhidhānamapi ca yathāvat paśyati ityuktvā bhagavāṃstūṣṇīṃ bhāvamavasthitaḥ
T05nagsaliu:201: tadā ityādi tu bhikṣuśāriputro bodhisattvaṃ maitreyam upasaṃkramyedaṃ paryapṛcchat /
T05nagsaliu:202: ityuktvā iti bhagavataḥ śāriputreṇa yatsūtraṃ śrutaṃ tad bhikṣūn uktvā upadiśya /
T05nagsaliu:203: nāyaka iti vividhopāyanayena sattvānām nayanatvān nāyakaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:204: tūṣṇīṃbhāvamavasthitaḥ samādhiṃ samāpadya viharati sm ityadhivacanam /
T05nagsaliu:205: bhikṣuḥ śāriputraḥ śrutvā ityuvāca bhikṣuḥ iti - kleśabhañjanād bhikṣuḥ /
T05nagsaliu:206: śāriputraḥ śrutvā iti tu bhagavataḥ śrutvā /
T05nagsaliu:207: sūtre tadāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yatretyādinā deśitavān /
T05nagsaliu:208: gatvā maitreyasannidhau tu yatra bodhisattvo maitreyo dine sadāvasthitaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:212: tathāgate 'dya maitreya uktyarthaṃ na vibhajya ca /
T05nagsaliu:213: tṛṣṇīṃbhāve sthite cātra tadartho gamyate katham / ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:214: adya maitreya ityuktvā bhikṣūn bhagavān śālistambopamādeśanayā yaduktam - maitreya/
T05nagsaliu:222: kiṃ pratītyaṃ ca dharmaḥ kaḥ buddho 'pi katamastathā / ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:223: kathaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ paśyati /
T05nagsaliu:224: dharmaṃ paśyan buddhaṃ paśyati? iti tu
T05nagsaliu:225: pratītyaṃ tu kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaṃ buddhaṃ ca paśyati /
T05nagsaliu:230: bhāvātmikā hi maitrī syān maitreyo 'brūta nirṇayam /
T05nagsaliu:235: kimuktamiti cet anna bhagavatā ityādi uktam /
T05nagsaliu:250: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
T05nagsaliu:252: tatra pratītyasamutpādo nāma sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyayaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:254: api ca - avidyādibhavāṅgādīnām ayaṃ sambhavakramaḥ kathamavagantavyaḥ?
T05nagsaliu:256: karma ca katamad iti cet? ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:261: sa ca pratītyasamutpādo bāhya ādhyātmikaśca pṛthaktvād dvividho vyavasthāpitaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:268: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
T05nagsaliu:269: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
T05nagsaliu:270: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkura-puṣpābhyām abhinirvartita iti /
T05nagsaliu:271: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāt phalaparyantaṃ prādurbhavati /
T05nagsaliu:278: bījaṃ pṛthivyādau kiṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā hetoḥ pratyayaṃ matamiti /
T05nagsaliu:287: pṛthivyādau rnaivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ bījasaṃdhāraṇādi karomīti /
T05nagsaliu:288: bījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ eteṣāṃ pratyayena saṃdhāraṇādi kāryeṇa hitaṃ karomi /
T05nagsaliu:289: atha punaḥ pṛthivyādiṣu satsu bījādaṅkurādi prādurbhavati,
T05nagsaliu:296: tasmād iti tu avidyādi kramaśaḥ prādurbhavati /
T05nagsaliu:306: tasmāt kudṛṣṭitvāt mithyā mārgācaraṇena aniṣṭavipākābhinirvartitatvāt hetu-karma-phalāni apavādāropākāreṇa praviṣṭatvān mithyādṛṣṭiriti /
T05nagsaliu:309: samyakmārgopayogād abhīṣṭaphalābhinirhāratvād anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyā-dyākāreṇa praviṣṭa tvāt samyakdṛṣṭiriti /
T05nagsaliu:318: cintanaṃ ca idamidaṃ kariṣya iti ādau citte nidhāya kāya-vāk-citta-caryākuśalaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:331: -nairātmyādi-rūpeṇa pravṛtteḥ sarvārya janāvisaṃvādinī samyaṅmārgānusāritvāt samyagvāg ityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:365: yā kāyavākcittacaryāsvaparopakāra-mātrakuśalapravṛtyā āryamārgam anusarati sā samyagvyāyāmatvāt samyakvyāyāmaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:374: guṇānusmaraṇaṃ pūrvīkṛtya buddha-dharma-saṃgha-śīla-tyāga-devādyanusmaraṇaṃ samyaksmṛtiḥ mārgāṅgam eva ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:378: samādhirapi bhūtatvān mithyāsamādhiḥ mithyeti tu viparyayaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:380: api tu-rūpādi-bāhyavastūni anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyākārīṇi nitya-sukha-śucyātma dṛṣṭayāditayā adhyavasīya teṣu ālambanapūrvakaṃ yaccittaspharaṇam,
T05nagsaliu:390: evam yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
T05nagsaliu:392: viśuddhātmā hi yaḥ paśyed dharmatathyaṃ sa paśyati /
T05nagsaliu:408: ādimadhyāntarahitam advayaṃ dhātutrayavirahitaṃ kāya-vāk-cittakarmasamatikrāntaṃ maṇiratnarājavividharūpasadṛśaṃ guṇamaṇivividhaprabhābhiḥ nirantaraṃ jagadarthakāri śāntaṃ,
T05nagsaliu:414: tathoktamāryaṃ dṛṣṭatvād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati /
T05nagsaliu:420: yaḥ paśyatīti yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ dharmañcaivaṃ paśyati sa dharmajaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:422: tatrātra pratītyasamutpādaḥ kīdṛśa ukta iti cet /
T05nagsaliu:424: prāṇādirahitād yaśca iti tu yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satataṃ prāṇādirahitaṃ prāṇarahitam,
T05nagsaliu:431: imāni sarvāṇi bāhyābhyantarāṇi vastūni sajīvāni indriyānvitāni /
T05nagsaliu:434: ye prāṇinaḥ prāṇino na bhakṣanti te prāṇinastu mokṣaṃ prāpnuvantīti ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:441: te 'pi parasparamanyonyakalpanā-parikalpanā-vikalpa-rahitvāt tṛṇa-vṛkṣa-bhitti-dharmasadṛśā acalāḥ niṣkriyāśca tasmāt prāṇādirahitatvād ajīvāḥ
T05nagsaliu:450: bāhyavastuṣu sūryasya candrasya ca sparśavaśena layo vistaraśca anumīyete /
T05nagsaliu:452: vāyusañcāravaśād vṛkṣa-śākhādi-kampanānumānāt teṣāṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kuta upalabhyate /
T05nagsaliu:454: chinne utpāda iti ayam artho 'siddha eva iti darśayitum ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:457: anicchādicaryāṃ prārthanādiṃ vā tato 'nyatragamanaṃ vālpamapi na kurvanti /
T05nagsaliu:461: sacetanānām aṅga-pratyaṅgādicchedānutpāda-dharmitvād acetanatāyā eva prasaṅgo jāyate /
T05nagsaliu:478: vyupaśāntyantamiti tu upaśamam ante darśayituṃ vyupaśamaparyantam /
T05nagsaliu:479: yastu etādṛśanayena dharmaṃ satatam ajīvādisvabhāvaṃ paśyati /
T05nagsaliu:480: pratītyaṃ dharmabuddhau ca śuddhibuddhayā hi paśyati /
T05nagsaliu:484: āryadharmamabhisaṃbudhya iti tu yo pāpadharmāṇāṃ pāre arthāt dūre sa āryaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:494: tathāpi yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmakṛtānuttarabodhyaśaikṣasvabhāvatāṃ paśyati /
T05nagsaliu:495: yena sa āryajñānagocaradharmaṃ tādṛśaṃ svayathāvad abhisaṃbodheḥ dharmajñaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:496: dharmanirmāṇaṃ dharmadarśanam buddhadarśanam iti bhagavatā uktam /
T05nagsaliu:506: buddhotpādo bhavenno vā sthiteyaṃ dharmatā yataḥ /
T05nagsaliu:509: atrāhetuḥ pratikūlahetuḥ vā pravartako nivartako vā ko 'pi nāsti /
T05nagsaliu:510: tasmāt tathāgatānāmutpādādvā anutpādād vā dharmato dharmasthitito dharmaniyamataśca eṣa pravāhaḥ, ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:511: yadi pratyayarahitena ekenaiva hetunā bhāvā utpadya tiṣṭhanti,
T05nagsaliu:512: yadi pratyayo 'pi hetumanapekṣya kiñcidutpādayituṃ samarthaḥ cettadā te sthitā asthitā iti vaktuṃ yujyeta,
T05nagsaliu:513: teṣāmutpādaḥ phalodbhavo 'pi nāhetor na cāpratyayāt tathāgatānāmutpādo vānutpādo vā eṣā dharmatā dharmasthitatā ca āditaḥ pravartete //
T05nagsaliu:514: tadyathā - pratītyasamutpādasya dharma etatpratyayatāphalamiti bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa uktaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:518: hetupratyaya-kramavat pratītyasamutpādasamateti hetvabhāve pratyayāpravṛttiḥ pratyayābhāve ca na hetu-pravṛttiḥ /
T05nagsaliu:526: evamapi pratītyasamutpādo 'yam ityādi hetupratyayadvividhatvād hetupratyayobhayārtha pratītyasamutpādasya kramo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:531: evaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaviśeṣeṇa pṛthag hetupratyayānāṃ lakṣaṇa-bhedaḥ kīdṛśa iti cet /
T05nagsaliu:533: tatra katamo bāhyaḥ sahetukaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti uktvā tadidam - bījādaṅkuraḥ /
T05nagsaliu:537: nālādgaṇḍaḥ gaṇḍād garbham [garbhācchūkaḥ] puṣpāt phalam ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:545: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkurādi abhinirvartayāmi iti /
T05nagsaliu:546: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījādinā abhinirvartitaḥ iti /
T05nagsaliu:547: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
T05nagsaliu:548: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti /
T05nagsaliu:549: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāditaḥ phalādi paryantaṃ prādurbhāvaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:552: pratyayastu pṛthivyādi kālāntaṃ hi yathā kramam /
T05nagsaliu:553: tasmādeva kathaṃ bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya ityādi uktam /
T05nagsaliu:554: bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandhāḥ katidhā draṣṭavyā ityuktam ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
T05nagsaliu:556: pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātūnāṃ yathākramaṃ samavāyād bāhyapratītyasamutpādasyeti pratyayatā yathākramam /
T05nagsaliu:558: eṣām hetupratyayānāṃ katamasya karma katamad iti cet?
T05nagsaliu:562: tatra pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karotīti bījamaṅkurotpādonmukhamāśrayatvāt kaṭhinatvameva ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:564: tejo dhātuḥ paripācayatīti paripuṣṭayavasare upapadyamāne paraspara-sparśeṇoṣṇatā eva paripāka iti ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:566: svāvasthāyāḥ samuddhṛtya bahirā nayanād vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati vardhayatīti ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:569: ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmanakṛtyaṃ karotīti ṛturapi sarvākāraṃ abhinirharati /
T05nagsaliu:574: no cet pratyayasāmagrī bīje bhūte 'pi nāṅkuraḥ /
T05nagsaliu:580: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃghātakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T05nagsaliu:588: na svato parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /
T05nagsaliu:593: atra na kaścidutpadyate na ca kaścin nirudhyate /
T05nagsaliu:602: tasmād vastūnāṃ svabhāvata utpādo na yujyate,
T05nagsaliu:604: yasyānusāraṃ bhāvāḥ satataṃ sthitāḥ tadanusāram utpāda-kriyā-karma-sthiti-vināśā api na yujyante,
T05nagsaliu:606: tasmād atra doṣasya prasajyamānatvān na svata ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:607: bhāvānām svata utpādaścet nityamutpādaprasaṃgaḥ syāt, ākāśavat /
T05nagsaliu:608: kasyacidapi kutrāpi kadāpi utpādo nirodho vā nāstīti cet- ucyate- pratyakṣavirodhaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:610: tasmāt tāvad bhāvānāṃ na svabhāvata utpādaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:615: tathā sati gamana-āgamana-calana-kampana-nirākaraṇa-manyanā-kriyā-karmāṇi tatraiva anyatrāpi ca pravartante /
T05nagsaliu:623: ayaṃ hetuḥ śayanopamayā na yujyate saṃghātatvāt /
T05nagsaliu:625: katham ātmā asaṃghātaḥ san svaśarīrābhāve śayanādīn aṅgasaṃghān svarūpeṇopakartuṃ yujyate /
T05nagsaliu:629: ātmanaḥ saṃghātatvād hetupratyayayorutpādopalabdha ātmātmīya iti manyanākārapravṛtteḥ cittamevātmā ityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:630: atrāntaḥ karaṇapuruṣaḥ kūrmakeśasvabhāvavad yuktyanumānarahitastu kvacinnāstīti darśayitum bhagavatā bāhyādhyātmikabhāvānāṃ parata utpādo na yujyata ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:631: yadi bhāvānāṃ svato 'pi notpādo na ca parato 'pi,
T05nagsaliu:632: tadā bhāvānāṃ dvividha utpāda iti cet,
T05nagsaliu:634: na dvayoḥ na ca kālata ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:636: anye tu svaparayoḥ sambandhād bhāvotpādaṃ manyante /
T05nagsaliu:638: tathāpi svato 'nupalabdhatvāt parataścābhāvāt na dvayoḥ ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:639: hetu-pratyayātiriktaṃ na svato na parata iti bhagavatā uktam /
T05nagsaliu:641: tadā paratantreṇa kartrā utpādavināśau bhaviṣyata iti kaiściducyate /
T05nagsaliu:642: anye tīrthikāstu karttā nāma kaścid ādyaḥkartā,
T05nagsaliu:644: sa eva bāhyamābhyantarañcedaṃ sarvam utpādayati vināśayatīti manyante /
T05nagsaliu:647: atha kasyeti cet- hetupratyayasambandhād bhāvānāṃ pravṛttirbhāsate /
T05nagsaliu:648: kartustu ākāśavan nirvikāratvāt tadadhīnā utpāda-sthitivināśāśca naiva yujyante /
T05nagsaliu:650: karttari nirvikāra-niṣkriyākāśātmani kriyā karma ca kiñcidapi nāsti /
T05nagsaliu:651: utpadyamānā bhāvā hetupratyayāpekṣāḥ pravṛtti-kramodbhūtā eva bhāsante /
T05nagsaliu:652: yadanusāraṃ karttāramapekṣate pravṛttistadanusāraṃ bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśāśca sadā āsannā bhavanti /
T05nagsaliu:653: karturnityatvād bhāvānām utpādao-sthiti-vināśā yugapad bhaviṣyanti athavā utpāda-sthiti-vināśā na bhaviṣyanti /
T05nagsaliu:654: nityatvāt kvacidapi kiñcidapi utpādo vā vināśo vā na syāt /
T05nagsaliu:655: hetuṃ pratyayañca apekṣya pravartamānānāṃ bhāvānāmeva kartṛ-kriyā-hetuphalotpādasamaḥ kramodbhava upalabhyate /
T05nagsaliu:657: avikārahetubhiḥ parasparamāśritya pravartamānaiḥ utpādaniyamo na yujyate /
T05nagsaliu:660: hetau phale ca saṃbhinne 'vikārastu kathaṃ bhavet /
T05nagsaliu:662: kriyānanvitavandhyāputrātmani kasyāścit kriyāyāḥ karmaṇo vā niyatena ayuktatvād bhagavaddharmeṣu avisaṃvāditvād bhāvotpādakriyā karttāraṃ nāpekṣate,
T05nagsaliu:663: kintu sati hetupratyayasaṅgrahe bhāvānāmutpādavināśau yujyeta ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:672: sukha-duḥkhādayaḥ svargo vimokṣaśca tāni sarvāṇi cittotpādamātreṇoddhṛtānīti vadanti /
T05nagsaliu:675: gatānugatikāścaiva yuktiviśeṣarahite tasmin gauravapravaṇatvāt pūrvottaraviruddhaṃ bālayuvakacāṇḍālavadayathārtha pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ,
T05nagsaliu:681: yuktyāgamādiviruddhaṃ ca vāṅmātreṇa pakṣīkṛtya nijājñānapaṭalena netrācchādanatvād asamarthatvāt paśubhūtāstu paśubhyo 'pyatichudratarāḥ paśavaḥ
T05nagsaliu:684: utpāde sthitau ca sahetuka evābhyupagamyamāne sati nityavādabhaṅgatvād vādotsargaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:686: icchāmātreṇa utpāde sati yugapadeva sampūrṇajagata utpādasthiti-vināśāḥ syuḥ /
T05nagsaliu:705: ekāntakriyāyuktā yuktayorgāmbhīryaguṇasya rūpādervā ālambana cintanasyaiva ayuktatvāt,
T05nagsaliu:707: hetāvasati sarvatra pratyaya eva kathaṃ bhavet /
T05nagsaliu:709: bhāvakartā maheśaścet so 'pi kartā na manyate /
T05nagsaliu:710: pitrabhāve sutotpattiḥ sā neṣṭā dṛśyate na ca /
T05nagsaliu:714: tathā maheśvare nitye bhāvānāṃ syāt sadodbhavaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:719: tasmādīśvarakartṛtvābhyupagame bahudoṣasaṃbhavād bhagavatā bhāvānām utpādaḥ īśvarakṛto na yujyate ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:720: pare tu sarvaṃ kālena vivartitaṃ manyante /
T05nagsaliu:731: sa nityaścettadā tatra kriyāpekṣā na yujyate /
T05nagsaliu:738: sūryacandra-nakṣatra-parva-vatsarādi-bāhyābhyantarabhāvānāṃ gatagamyasvabhāvatvāt kālākhyayā bhāvānāmutpāda-sthiti-vināśāstu kālapariṇāmatvena na yujyante/
T05nagsaliu:739: anyacca, svabhāvavādina āntarabāhyān sarvabhāvān svabhāvodbhavān manyante /
T05nagsaliu:741: kasyacidbhāvasya utpādasya vināśasya vā kaścidapi heturnāsti /
T05nagsaliu:745: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sadā sthitam /
T05nagsaliu:748: vikāro vartate yatra nirvikāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
T05nagsaliu:752: kule rājani kṣetrādau tatphalaṃ cāpi bhāsate /
T05nagsaliu:753: svabhāve vikṛte jāte nityavādī tu bhraṃsate /
T05nagsaliu:755: evaṃ svabhāvavādiṣvapi parasparavirodhatvād utpāda-sthiti-vināśānāṃ svabhāvād udbhavo na yujyata ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:756: atha bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśā ahetuto bhavanti ityapare 'hetuvādino hetuṃ vinaiva kevalam bhāvānāmutpāda-nirodhau kalpayanti /
T05nagsaliu:761: tasmāttasyaiva doṣasya prasajyamānatvād ahetuvādo 'pi lokādi-viruddhatvād asiddha eva /
T05nagsaliu:763: na svataḥ parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /
T05nagsaliu:766: iti tu anādi-kālataḥ prapañca-vāsanābījasya avicchinna-nadīstrotaḥ-pravāhavad anupravṛtteḥ
T05nagsaliu:768: tasmādeva sūtre atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātusamavāyād bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:769: 'atha punaḥ' iti tu abhāvādudbhava-sva-para-dvaya-īśvarādi-rahita-bīja-pṛthivyādi-sāmagryā eva aṅkurādi utpadyata iti uktam /
T05nagsaliu:774: śāśvatato na cocchedān na saṅkrānteḥ parīttataḥ /
T05nagsaliu:784: na cocchedāditi na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate nācāpyaniruddhād /
T05nagsaliu:785: api tu bījād niruddhāt tasminneva samaye 'ṅkuro utpadyate /
T05nagsaliu:787: na saṃkrāntitaḥ iti tu bījāṅkurau tu asadṛśau eva /
T05nagsaliu:792: sadṛśānuprabodhād iti tu yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśameva phalābhinirvṛtiriti /
T05nagsaliu:801: upte śālyādi bīje hi śyāmākādiphalaṃ na hi /
T05nagsaliu:808: dvidhā hetuścapratyaya iti tu ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo hetūpanibandhanaḥ pratyayopanibandhanaśca dvayākāro 'vagantavyaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:809: iṣṭa iti abhīṣṭasya ca abhipretasya abhimatasya cetyadhivacanam /
T05nagsaliu:814: yattayormadhye syāt tat tu madhya iṣyate /
T05nagsaliu:826: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati / ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:843: evam ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśāṅgaḥ trisvabhāvatayā veditavyaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:846: avidyā yadi nādau syādante mṛtyurna saṃbhaved /
T05nagsaliu:847: 'avidyā yadi nādau syād' iti tu yadi avidyā cennābhaviṣyan naiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante /
T05nagsaliu:848: tadvad jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ cennābhaviṣyan naiva śokādi prajñāsyate /
T05nagsaliu:849: tebhyo bhinno na kutrāpi hyātmātmīyaśca vidyate /
T05nagsaliu:850: tatrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārādi abhinirvartayāmītyato jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ śokādi abhinirvartayāmīti /
T05nagsaliu:852: evam yāvajjarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirabhinirvartitā iti /
T05nagsaliu:863: pratyayastu sāmagrī ṣaṭ prakārakā iti ṣaḍvidhāḥ /
T05nagsaliu:867: tasmāt sūtre -ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśa-vijñānādistvādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ / ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:871: anyacca asmin kāye yatkiñcidasti tatsarvaṃ saṃgṛhya pṛthivīdhāturucyate /
T05nagsaliu:878: anyacca yatkiñcitkaṃ tādṛśaṃ tatsarvaṃ tu tejodhāturucyate /
T05nagsaliu:895: ūrdhvavāyuradhovāyuranyaccāpi etatkāyamadhye yatkiñcit tādṛśamasti tatsarvam ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya vāyudhāturityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:903: tataḥ kliṣṭaṃ manaścāpi iti kleśamayaṃ manaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:904: tāni ca caturmahābhūtāni ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya naḍakalāpayogena nāmarūpamityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:908: rūpaṃ nāma pitroḥ śukraśoṇitodbhūtaṃ antarābhavamāśritya yat prathamaṃ nāmarūpābhinirvartanaṃ
T05nagsaliu:913: ātmotkarṣaścetyetatkleśasaṃyutaṃ kliṣṭaṃ mana iti ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtaṃ nāmarūpamityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:920: asya kartrādi na vartate iti bhāvaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:922: iti tu asmābhirete utpāditā iti ca tairvayamutpāditā iti te 'nyonya vikalpaṃ notpādayanti /
T05nagsaliu:923: teṣu satsu samutpādaḥ teṣvasatsu na saṃbhavaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:934: 'na strī', na pumān - na napuṃsakastu ādhyātmikastrī puruṣa-napuṃsakātmakaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:935: na cāhaṃ mam iti tu ātmātmīya-manyanā-viyuktatvāt /
T05nagsaliu:946: na napuṃsakam na cāhaṃ na mama syāt /
T05nagsaliu:947: na ceśvarādi anyat kiñcid iti jñātavyam /
T05nagsaliu:957: ucyate - tatra kāmadhātuḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadāśrayanikāyavijñaptyavabhāsaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇa-svabhāvena ekapiṇḍatvena kalpayan saṃjñayā grahaṇatvād avidyeti ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:971: sthitvā svakarmavaśena vijñaptyavabhāsa-vikalpodbhavānāṃ yadajñānaṃ seyamavidyā ityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:983: tadbhinnavibhāgena sthitaṃ parvata-aṭavī-vana-udyāna-nadī-grāmādiṣu svakarma-vaśāt prajñaptāvabhāsa-vikalpanodbhūtamanyasthānānāṃ yadajñānaṃ tadapi avidyetyucyate /
T05nagsaliu:984: naraka-sattvānāṃ svakarmavaśitānukūlavikalpanodbhavānāṃ tu anavataptamahāsāgarād viṃśatisāhasra-yojanādhobhājanasya vijñapti-svabhāvamūlabhūteṣu anyasthāneṣvabhi-nirvṛttiḥ /
T05nagsaliu:996: svavijñānāvabhāsavikalpanāvaśenodbhūtaṃ vibhinnaprapaṃca-vāsanāliptaṃ tādṛśaṃ yadajñānam idamapi avidyetyucyate /
T05nagsaliu:1011: evaṃ pṛthaggati-yoni-bahutva-bhedena vibhinna-sattvabhājanalokā ityākhyātāḥ sādhāraṇā-sādhāraṇaviśeṣādipiṇḍagrahodbhūta ekataḥ saṃkṣipya kāmadhāturityucyate
T05nagsaliu:1039: paramāṇūnāṃ parasparaṃ saṃcayātmakatvāt piṇḍagrāho na yujyate /
T05nagsaliu:1052: evaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ tadanityādisvabhāvasya yadajñānaṃ iyamavidyetyucyate /
T05nagsaliu:1053: tatra avidyeti tu vidyā na bhūtatvād avidyā /
T05nagsaliu:1060: avidyā tu na vidyābhāvaḥ vidyādharmato viruddhā avidyeti ucyate /
T05nagsaliu:1082: jñānaṃ samādhiḥ rūpaṃ ca vaśitāprativedinaḥ / ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1094: tatpratyayāt tannidānācca vidyāyāṃ rāga-dveṣa-moha-ahaṃkāra-dṛṣṭi-saṃśaya-īrṣyā-mātsaryānugāmanād akuśala-kāyakarmata ātmano jñānasya ca paritrāṇārtha prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānaṃ,
T05nagsaliu:1101: tatra avidyayā iti avidyā-pratyayena saṃskārabhāvābhisaṃskāritvād vibhāvitaṃ saṃskārabhāva-prativijñaptisvabhāvaṃ vijñānamabhinirvartate / tasmādeva
T05nagsaliu:1103: iti uktam / tataḥ iti tu saṃskāramāśritya bhāvānāṃ vijñaptiriti tu vijñāpakatvād vijñaptiḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1106: iti vijñānena sahodgatā iti tu vijñānasya hetuta udbhūtāḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1118: iti yatpūrvaṃ indriye satṛṣṇavāsanānāmarūpaṃ sthāpitaṃ tannāmarūpaṃ saṃniśritya cakṣurādi-ṣaḍindriyābhinirvartanena indriyasya ṣaḍāyatanāni prādurbhavantīti /
T05nagsaliu:1124: indriyavijñānaṃ rūpādiviṣayeṣu sparśa iva nirāntarameva pravartate /
T05nagsaliu:1126: asaṃcita-pañcavijñānāni saṃcita viṣayendriyaiḥ saha yugapadekatra bhūtatvāt sparśavanti santi,
T05nagsaliu:1128: tasmādeva bhagavatāpi trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1130: tadvat sparśarasāsvādaniyantraṇe ṣaṭsparśā kāyānāśritya ṣaḍvedanākāyā utpadyante /
T05nagsaliu:1133: vedanā tu sparśeṇa janitā sparśahetūdbhavā ityadhivacanam /
T05nagsaliu:1137: vedanāvabhāsākāravijñapti vikalpanāvaśodbhūtānāṃ trivargabhedena ṣaḍvedanākāyotpādād bhagavatā sparśasahabhavā vedanetyuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1138: tadvat kiñcidvedanāsvādasaktā abhiniveśātmikā hi vedanāhetukī tṛṣṇeti tṛṣṇodbhavaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1146: sā ca indriyaviṣayavijñānabhedena tṛṣṇākāyaḥ ṣaḍdhā vyavasthāpitā /
T05nagsaliu:1173: caryāvyakti-indriyabhraṃśa-smṛtibhraṃśāḥ iti tādṛśī tu jāti-pratyayena bhinirvartita-skandhānāṃ
T05nagsaliu:1212: atha mama priyavastu-iṣṭavastu-viyogo bhaviṣyati iti khidyamānasya santāpācchoka ityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:1232: he bhārya iti anekadhā pralāpo mithyāpadanirnādotpannaḥ pailottakasaṃtāpo daurmanasyam /
T05nagsaliu:1233: tasmāt śokataścāpalāpo yo daurmanasyaṃ sa ucyate / ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1246: tatra eṣāṃ dvādaśabhavāṅgānām anvartha nāmāni darśayituṃ - tamo 'bhijñānāmarūpāyatasparśavittarṣataḥ / ityuktam / ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1274: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ vibhinnāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
T05nagsaliu:1277: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T05nagsaliu:1291: āsvādanādhyavasānādhyavasāyasthānādātmapriyarūpa-sātarūpa-viyogo mābhūditi yasya bhūyaḥ praṇidhānamiyaṃ tṛṣṇā pratyayopādānetyucyate /
T05nagsaliu:1292: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca sa upādāna-pratyayo bhava ityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:1293: tatkarmanirjātānāṃ pañcaskandhānām abhinirvṛttiryā sā bhavapratyayo jātirityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:1311: atha cemānyasya catvāryaṅgāni hetuḥ saṃghātakārakāṇi ca,
T05nagsaliu:1312: dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
T05nagsaliu:1314: avidyā ca tṛṣā karma vijñānaṃ kramaśo matāḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1329: vijñāne na karomīdaṃ na vijñānamito matam /
T05nagsaliu:1330: tatra karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ityādi tu karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñāna-bījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi/
T05nagsaliu:1331: tṛṣṇāyā api ityādi tu evaṃ tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
T05nagsaliu:1332: avidyāyā api ityādi tu avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakiromīti /
T05nagsaliu:1333: vijñānasyāpi ityādi tu naivaṃ bhavati ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti /
T05nagsaliu:1337: avidyā-svavaskara iti svavaskareṇa ca sadṛśena svavaskaraṃ sarveṣvanugata-tvāt /
T05nagsaliu:1343: iti tu hetu pratyayasāmagyā utpādastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
T05nagsaliu:1347: nāmarūpāṅkuramidaṃ tu svayaṃ parata ubhayādito notpannam /
T05nagsaliu:1351: piturmātuḥ samāgamād ityādi tu pitṛmātṛsaṃyogo vā saktiḥ,
T05nagsaliu:1358: svayaṃ gandharvasyāpi citta-viparyaye 'pi mātāpitṛkriyādhimuktau garbhotpādakrameṇa kalala-arbuda-peśī-ghana-praśākhāvasthāmatikramya prasūtasya,
T05nagsaliu:1364: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād-ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyāttatrāsvādaviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati
T05nagsaliu:1368: tasmād asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyādityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1369: asvāmikeṣu iti tu antaḥ karaṇaṃ puruṣādi anupalambhanasvabhāvamasti /
T05nagsaliu:1374: māyālakṣaṇa-svabhāva iti yathā māyā tu abhūtāpi vividhavyavahāraṃ pratipādayati,
T05nagsaliu:1385: tasmāt cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañcālokañcākāśañca tajjamanasikārañca ityādi uktam /
T05nagsaliu:1386: tatra cakṣuriti rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ vikalaṃ bhavati /
T05nagsaliu:1388: āloka iti candra-nakṣatrāgni-auṣadhi-maṇi-prabhānām abhivyaktyai āloko 'pi upasthitaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1397: iti tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati 'ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśraya-kṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T05nagsaliu:1400: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T05nagsaliu:1401: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T05nagsaliu:1402: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhāra-kṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T05nagsaliu:1404: atha ca punaḥ satsveṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati /
T05nagsaliu:1421: asmāditi tu asmāllokāt paraṃ lokam athavā paralokād amuṃ lokaṃ kaściddharmo na saṃkrāmati /
T05nagsaliu:1422: yadyevaṃ nityavādo vā ahetu-pratikūla-hetuvādo vā bhaviṣyatīti cet /
T05nagsaliu:1425: tatra saṅkrāntyabhāve 'pi karmaphalāvināśitvaṃ pratyakṣānumāna-viśvastāgama-prakhyātena anenodāharaṇena jñātavyam /
T05nagsaliu:1441: kartṛkriyāvihīnaṃ tad iti tatra kartā kriyā ca na staḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1442: kiṃ tannocchidyata iti cet- tathotpādāvabhāsanam ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1443: kathaṃ kartṛvihīnaṃ kriyā karma ca bhaviṣyatīti ucyate- pūrvavṛddhikramācca syāt /
T05nagsaliu:1445: parītto dakapātrānte dṛśyate na ca krāmati /
T05nagsaliu:1448: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'bhyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate /
T05nagsaliu:1455: api ca, tadyathāgnirupādāne pratyaye sati jvalati upādāna-vaikalyānna jvalati /
T05nagsaliu:1456: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatropapattyāyatana-pratisandhau mātuḥkukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
T05nagsaliu:1460: tatra bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya kriyākarma-vyavasthā tu kalpanātmikā jñeyā /
T05nagsaliu:1476: aparādhīno viśvarūpamaṇiratnarāja iva anuttaro dharmakāya ityucyate /
T05nagsaliu:1484: yasmādanye maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anya aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1485: na tu ya eva maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1487: ya eva vināśa-hetussa evāpi aupapattiko bhaviṣyati /
T05nagsaliu:1488: ato maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikā skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
T05nagsaliu:1490: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu iti niruddhaya na ciraṃ gatatvād aupapattyaṃśikā iti aupapattyaṃśe niśritatvād aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
T05nagsaliu:1493: tada-yuktatvāduktam- api tu maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
T05nagsaliu:1494: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikā skandhā prārdubhavanti,
T05nagsaliu:1503: yaḥ kaścid imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā
T05nagsaliu:1533: tucchata iti muktātmano hrasvalohavad ekāntasya abhāvāt /
T05nagsaliu:1539: anityata iti sahopapādavināśaḥ skandhāt pṛthaganyana svabhāvāt /
T05nagsaliu:1541: śūnyata iti kalpanā svabhāvatayā abhūta-parikalpanāyāḥ pṛthakatvābhāvāt /
T05nagsaliu:1545: kiṃ kathaṃ vā kutaḥ kena kalpavādādi hānitaḥ/
T05nagsaliu:1548: tathatārthaṃ sa eva pūrvāntaṃ na pratisarati ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1551: ahaṃ devo vā gandharvo vā kiṃ sukhavihāro duḥkhavihāro 'bhūvamityayaṃ moho'bhāva eva /
T05nagsaliu:1556: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani iti ca āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmi iti moho 'pyatra nāstyeva /
T05nagsaliu:1557: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani iti anāgate 'dhvani devo vā piśāco vā naro vā kiṃ vā bhaviṣyāmīti atra mohasyāpyanudbhava eva /
T05nagsaliu:1558: sukhī vā duḥkhī vā surūpo vā kurūpo vā kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi iti moho 'pyatra nāsti /
T05nagsaliu:1559: antarapi na pratisarati iti antarna muhyati /
T05nagsaliu:1560: kiṃ nvidamiti ātmā nirātmā vā iti /
T05nagsaliu:1561: kathaṃ nvidamiti kiṃ sarūpo 'thavā virūpo veti moho 'tra nodbhavati /
T05nagsaliu:1562: ke santa iti sukṛta-karmakāriṇaḥ duṣkṛta-karmakāriṇo veti na mohotpādaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1563: ayaṃ sattvo devagaternaragatervā kuta āgata itaścyuto deveṣu manuṣyeṣu narake prete tiryañci vā kutra gamiṣyatīti moho 'tra na sambhavati /
T05nagsaliu:1570: viparītadhāraṇā-samutthānārthaṃ pudgalavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu punargamanatvāt pudgala iti skandha-vyatiriktaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1571: yasyāmuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā paraloka-gamanasya paralokaṃ vihāya amuṃ etallokagamanasya cābhāvāt grahaṇa-durviparītagrahaṇamityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1582: amunau munisaṃjñayā ṣaḍjagaccakra-praviṣṭa-buddhimato gamanaṃ gamyaṃ ca saṃsāramevānusaranti na tu nirvāṇamiti /
T05nagsaliu:1583: teṣāṃ samyak prajñayā darśane caturvidhaviparyaya-rahitatvāt samucchinnamūlāni tālavṛkṣamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpāda-nirodhadharmāṇi iti /
T05nagsaliu:1591: tathā iti yathā candrasya rūpe dūrasthite 'pi parīttajalabhājaneṣu jale vipulatailapātreṣu vā avabhāsate /
T05nagsaliu:1594: evam asmānna kaściccyuto na gato nāgato,
T05nagsaliu:1596: tadvajjalabhājanavat sattvasantānasya jagataḥ sthānāntareṣu bahurūpeṇa cittacandrabimbotpādaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:1602: karmakleśa-lipta-cittasantānaṃ vahnistrotonibaddhamindhanaṃ tu karmakleśata eva syāditi parīkṣyate /
T05nagsaliu:1605: tadvad atrāpi karmakleśendhanamucchidya saṃkleśālaya-vijñānabījao-santāne jñānāgni-saṃyogād dagdhe sati hetu-nirodhān na phalodbhavaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1606: tasmādevoktam - yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇa-brāhmāṇānāṃ tadyathā iti ito bāhyānām lokastu lokaḥ /
T05nagsaliu:1612: tadyathā - ātmavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu pañcopādāna-skandheṣu rūpa-vedanā-saṃjñā-saṃskāra-vijñārnoṣvati ātmātmīya-rahiteṣu,
T05nagsaliu:1641: pūrvākṣiptālaya-vijñānād astitva-vāsanā-bhedena tu dhātoḥ ākāra-viśeṣānanta-prasarānvitasya saṃskāra-skandha-saṃgṛhītatvāt saṃskāraskandha iti
T05nagsaliu:1644: vikalpanāvaśodbhūtālaya-vijñānasya vāsanopanibaddhatvād dhātorākāra-viśeṣa-bhedenānantaprasaro hi vijñānaskandha iti /
T05nagsaliu:1647: tathāpi tatra ādāveva kartrādirahito riktastuccho 'sāra iti viditvā caturāryasatya-bhāvanānulomapravṛttyā
T05nagsaliu:1652: ca tad-duḥkhamavagamya kleśālayavijñānavāsanāṃ saṃnihatya pudgaladharmanairātmyam avabudhya,
T05nagsaliu:1654: skandhādau dhātau āyatane ca grāhya-grāhakatāṃ vihāya dharmanairātmyasamatāyāṃ praviśe,
T05nagsaliu:1672: sa eva pudgaladharmanairātmyakṣamatānvitatvād anuttarasamyaksambodhiṃ vyākṛtavat paśyet,
T05nagsaliu:1674: tasmāt sūtre- yo bhadanta śāriputra kulaputro kuladuhitā vā evaṃvidha-dharmakṣānti-samanvitaḥ,
T05nagsaliu:1675: tasya tathāgato 'rhat samyaksambuddho 'nuttaraḥ samyaksambodhiṃ vyākaroti ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1679: bodhisattvo maitreyo 'pi śālistambopamā kṛtā idaṃ sūtram vistareṇa vibhajya bhāṣitavān /
T05nagsaliu:1680: bodhisattvamaitreyeṇa bhāṣitāṃ śālistambopamāṃ kṛtvā śāriputrastu tacchrutvā iti śālistambopamā kṛtā /
T05nagsaliu:1685: saḥstuta iti tvayā yathoktaḥ tathaiva asti nānyatheti,
T05nagsaliu:1689: tasmādeva sūtre- atha āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitam abhinandya utthāyāsanāt prakrānta ityuktam /
T05nagsaliu:1690: maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamuktaṃ maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena,
T05nagsaliu:1694: gatvā bhikṣubhyo gambhīrodārādbhutaṃ sūtraṃ yathāśrutavat sarvasattvahitāya bhāṣitam /
T05nagsaliu:1698: bhāratīyopādhyāyena dharmaśrībhadreṇa lokacakṣuṣā bhadantasādhumatinā jñāna kumāreṇa cānūditā /
